text: Herøysund is a village in Kvinnherad municipality in Vestland county, Norway. The village is located on the southeastern shore of the Hardangerfjorden, about half-way between the villages of Husnes (to the south) and Uskedal (to the north). The village has a population (2019) of 506 and a population density of . ==References== Category:Villages in Vestland Category:Kvinnherad
title: Herøysund
